def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    index_of_first_digit = sequence.index(first_digit)
    transformed_sequence = sequence[:index_of_first_digit] + '0' + first_digit + sequence[index_of_first_digit + 1:]
    return transformed_sequence

the original sequence "33330000000000" is transformed into "03333000000000", the original sequence "07777777700000" is transformed into "00777777770000", the original sequence "00003333300000" is transformed into "00000333330000"

def transform(sequence):
    first_digit = sequence[0]
    index_of_first_digit = sequence.index(first_digit)
    transformed_sequence = sequence[:index_of_first_digit] + '0' + first_digit + sequence[index_of_first_digit + 1:]
    return transformed_sequence
